Container.Name: wled-presets
Container.Overview: WLED Preset Picker - A mobile-friendly web interface for selecting and applying presets across multiple WLED devices. Features admin authentication, device discovery, and preset management.

Config.Name: Web UI Port
Config.Description: Port for the web interface (set via PORT env var with host networking)

Config.Name: Session Secret
Config.Description: Secret key for session encryption. Use a long random string for security.

Config.Name: Admin Password
Config.Description: Password for the admin account (minimum 12 characters)

Config.Name: Data Storage
Config.Description: Path to store database and settings

Config.Name: Discovery on Startup
Config.Description: Automatically discover WLED devices on container startup (1=enabled, 0=disabled). Recommended for host network mode.

Config.Name: Discovery Auto-Save
Config.Description: Automatically save newly discovered devices to configuration (1=enabled, 0=disabled)

Config.Name: Discovery Subnets
Config.Description: Optional: Comma-separated CIDR subnets to scan (e.g., 192.168.1.0/24,192.168.2.0/24). Leave empty to auto-detect all local networks.

Config.Name: Discovery Debug
Config.Description: Enable verbose discovery logging for troubleshooting (1=enabled, 0=disabled)

Config.Name: Secure Cookie
Config.Description: Set to 1 if using HTTPS via reverse proxy, 0 for HTTP

Config.Name: Trust Proxy
Config.Description: Set to 1 if behind a reverse proxy
